summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to noise control, amending Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 25.08 by adding Section 25.08.425 to regulate noise caused by construction and equipment operations, and amending Section 25.08.530 (Ordinance 106360, Section 601, as last amended by Ordinance 110047, Section 3), Section 25.08.540 (Ordinance 106360, Section 602, as last amended by ordinance 108498, Section 1),, and Section 25.08.080 (Ordinance 106360, Section 204).
